Name: Creamy Bee
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of cinnamon & sugar rim with raspberry.
Review: Creamy cinnamon with hints of honey, nuts and berries.
History: Created in 2002 at Hush, London, England and originally made with cinnamon syrup in place of Goldschläger.
